language.entry: lignite
main menu
options
speed
#L1#Look out, a massive wolfpack was spotted in the region.
#L1#Winter is coming.#L2#Oh wait, it is here already.
#L1#The Viking Union is up to no good.#L2#I don't care as long as they bring in some food.
#L1#Have you heard about the Minotaur? They say it is a beast!#L2#Better avoid it.
#L1#All gauges are nominal. The Transarctica is combat ready, Conductor.
#L1#This engine has cutting edge technonolgy. The Viking Union spared no expense.
#L1#Please try to keep the Transarctica in one piece.
#L1#Slower speed can improve our coal economy.
